content:

It's so creepy mah~...

content:
Coming to peek at our fields in the middle of the night mah~?
You look mighty suspicious!
Are you really going to steal what few precious tomatoes we have left mah~?
info: 第一天-发现被贡的田_云果线1

content:
It sounds like it might be true mah~
Is it really true or false?
It's false... or is it true mah~?
info: 第一天-发现被贡的田_云果线1

content: N-no, no, that's not it at all mah~!
info: 第一天-发现被贡的田_云果线1

content:
Of course it's true mah~! We're farmers,
I planted these crops with my own hands,
If you don't believe me, let's plant some together and show you!
info: 第一天-发现被贡的田_云果线1

content:
Um, {me}, let's clean up the field first mah~
I need to check if this fruit is suitable to grow here,
So... could you help with the weeding please?

content:
N-no, we're not! We really aren't!
This field belongs to Yunguo, she's the one who farms it,
I'm {me}, I just came with her.
